meanings.sent1: The rumdums couldn't solve the simple puzzle.

meanings.definition: A person who is drunk or intoxicated.
meanings.sent1: The bartender refused to serve the rumdums more drinks.
meanings.sent2: After a few too many drinks, he turned into a rumdums.
meanings.sent3: The rumdums stumbled around the party, knocking over chairs.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with loud laughter from the rumdums.
meanings.sent5: He always ends up being the rumdums at our family gatherings.

meanings.definition: To act in a foolish or silly manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't rumdums around when we're trying to work.
